title: I bought a pixel 3a at your Hendersonville store fri,, and forgot pass word , cell phone locked out
content: i got locked out of my new phone when i got home, forgot pass word,,  went to store could not get it in. i have tried several pass words no dice. i have reset to factory reboot and it always asks for org pass word. really at my wits end. don
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
